page.title: 08CHIPPENHAM HOSPITAL
page.content: {Chippenham Hospital}is situated on the Eastern side of Chippenham on the main A4 road.It is a National Health Service Cottage Hospital. This small hospital has only 30 beds split into three wards. Some twenty consultants serve the hospital which has a nursing staff of just under forty. The hospital has two operating theatres. One for minor operations and the other for more serious operations.The hospital has a well equipped{X-ray department. Chippenham Hospital has a 24hour casualty department but most people who are taken to{Chippenham hospital are sent on to a much larger hospital in{Bath.
